author: Ural Garrett
title: Drake's "More Life" Inspires More Memes
text:
0 
Following months of anticipation, Drake finally released his More Life playlist over the weekend and social media found itself in a frenzy. The 22-track project featured some heavy guest apperances from Young Thug and 2 Chainz to Sampha and Kanye West. Making its premiere on Drizzy’s Apple Music radio show OVO Sound before being released on competitive platforms like Spotify and TIDAL, More Life also inspired some hilarious memes. Check out some of the best ones we found below. All Hail The Six God 
— Amber heikes (@the_only_Amber) March 20, 2017 More Life has me like pic.twitter.com/oa6OH85KNM
